credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: St. John the Baptist
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink, on paper
description: Drawing of John the Baptist sitting on a rock.  He holds a staff in his right hand while he stretches out the other and looks up to the skies.  A winged putto flies above and two others surround a lamb at the lower right corner.
name: Drawing
